category.catDesc: Used to denote a date calculated by the editor from a regnal year or some other dating method given in the text.

revisionDesc.change: CHANGED: Add a human readable version or the tei:relation element in a tei:desc.

personGrp.persName: The bishops from Syria who were in exile in Alexandria

relation.name: syriaca:RecipientOfLetterFrom
relation.desc: Recipient Of Letter From Severus of Antioch.

occupation.note: Cassian was the bishop of Bostra .
Constantine was the bishop of Laodicea in Syria
Antoninus was the bishop of Berrhoea .

relation.name: syriaca:SenderOfLetterTo
relation.desc: Severus of Antioch sent a letter to Antoninus, Constantine and Cassian.

relation.name: snap:ProfessionalRelationship
relation.mutual: http://syriaca.org/person/51 http://syriaca.org/person/2553 http://syriaca.org/person/2443 http://syriaca.org/person/2425 http://syriaca.org/person/2440 http://syriaca.org/person/2468
relation.desc: Severus of Antioch, Antoninus, Constantine, Cassian, Timothy IV and Paul had a professional relationship.

personGrp.persName: The saintly bishops in Isauria who effected the deprivation of Paul

occupation.note: Helladius was the bishop of Tarsus .
Eutherius was the bishop of Tyana .

relation.name: snap:EnmityFor
relation.desc: Severus of Antioch had enmity for Dorotheus, Eutherius, Himerius and Helladius.

occupation.note: Paul was the bishop of Emesa .

relation.name: snap:AllianceWith
relation.desc: Paul, Dorotheus, Eutherius, Himerius and Helladius formed an alliance.

person.persName: Cyril, the chief champion of orthodoxy

relation.name: syriaca:FollowerOf
relation.desc: Severus of Antioch was a follower of Cyril of Alexandria.

relation.name: syriaca:SenderOfLetterTo
relation.desc: Cyril of Alexandria sent a letter to Eusebius.

occupation.note: John was the bishop of Antioch .
Maximian was the bishop of Constantinople .

relation.name: syriaca:EpistolaryReferenceTo
relation.desc: A letter between Severus of Antioch referenced Severus of Antioch.

relation.name: syriaca:EpistolaryReferenceTo
relation.desc: A letter between Severus of Antioch referenced Severus of Antioch.
